structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

law.catch_line: Technical assistance by the Department for Local Government.
law.text: The Department for Local Government shall make available to all cities assistance in meeting the requirements of KRS 91A.010 to 91A.060, including the preparation and dissemination of model systems for accounting and budgeting, and other technical materials.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 69, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 63, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 47, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 46, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
